Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

openstockflow 0.1.0 (Development)

Initial Development

  • Package skeleton created
  • S4 class structure planned
  • Mathematical foundation documented
  • Testing infrastructure established

Planned Features

Phase 1: MVP

  • S4 classes for Stock, Flow, Link, StockFlowDiagram
  • Programmatic diagram construction API
  • ODE generation and deSolve integration
  • Basic visualization

Phase 2: Composition

  • Decorated cospan composition
  • Pushout computation
  • tidygraph integration

Phase 3: Stratification

  • Pullback stratification
  • Multi-dimensional stratification
  • Performance optimization

Phase 4: Polish

  • Parameter sensitivity analysis
  • Interactive visualization
  • CRAN submission

On this page

Developed by Ian Moran.
